findings.biliary: Multiple small stones in gallbladder and cystic duct, mild gallbladder wall thickening, mild edema/trace pericholecystic fluid, common bile duct normal
findings.pancreas: Multiple cystic lesions likely side-branch type IPMNs, largest 1.2 cm in uncinate process, main pancreatic duct normal
findings.adrenal_glands: 1.9 cm left adrenal lesion compatible with lipid rich adenoma
findings.kidneys: A few subcentimeter probable cysts in left kidney, otherwise unremarkable
findings.lymph_nodes: No enlarged upper abdominal lymph nodes
